mapper.insert: INSERT INTO custorder (cust_id, order_date, total_amount, shipping_address, shipping_name, shipping_phone) VALUES (#{custId}, NOW(), #{totalAmount}, #{shippingAddress}, #{shippingName}, #{shippingPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS orderId, cust_id AS custId, order_date AS orderDate, total_amount AS totalAmount, shipping_address AS shippingAddress, shipping_name AS shippingName, shipping_phone AS shippingPhone FROM custorder WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
